name: There Is Still Hope
description:
"A game about saving humanity"

Research planets and upgrade your rocket. Build factories and farms. Save humanity from extinction - or let them die.

"Management, risk, and taking advantages are your keys to success"

Researching needs time, and do you want to take the risk or not? The choice is yours.

How to Play

- Build factories and farms to produce more resources.

- Manage the economy.

- Upgrade your rocket using the resources you have.

- Research planets and choose the best one for humanity's new home.

- Don't fail humanity.

Notes:

This is my very first published game. If you experience any bugs or don't like the game, please tell me. Also, if you have any suggestions or ideas, don't hesitate to leave a comment. Thanks ;)
